Utility Classes

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dicta, est nisi? Minus totam voluptas, repellat ratione quisquam cumque eos, a perspiciatis saepe expedita incidunt sit repellendus vel inventore, nobis distinctio.

Caption

Makes text look like image caption, light grey and smaller.

Edit

Makes text red, reserved for pre-production notes.

Font sizes

Changes size of headings.

Highlight

Used with span to highlight a word or set of words like a sharpy highlighter.

Image border

Adds border to image.

Labels

Creates a badge-like label.

Lead

When added to

it makes it slightly larger.

Monospace

Used on text element to use monospace font.

Ratios

Formats media-containers proportionately.

Separator

Stylized line element to separate content.
